title: Who Deys Of Our Lives
description:
Mina talks to former NFL defensive back Darius Butler about Brian Flores' lawsuit and why so many black coaches in the NFL feel discouraged. Then they review the conference championship games and look ahead to Super Bowl LVI. How should the Bengals cover Cooper Kupp and Odell Beckham, Jr.? Should Jalen Ramsey shadow Ja'Marr Chase? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
